"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Loader2, CheckCircle, PlusCircle, AlertCircle, ShoppingBag, DollarSign, Coffee, Clock, TrendingUp, Users, ArrowUpRight, BookOpen, CreditCard, Settings, Search, } from "lucide-react" import "./Content.css" const DashboardSection = ({ title, children, icon }) => (

) const UserManagement = () => { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") useEffect(() => { const loadUsers = async () => { try { setLoading(true) const data = await fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/users/", { method: "GET", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, }).then((res) => res.json()) setUsers(data) setError(null) } catch (err) { setError("Failed to load users. Please try again later.") } finally { setLoading(false) } } loadUsers() }, []) // Filter users based on search term const filteredUsers = users.filter( (user) => user.UserName?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || user.Email?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()), ) return (

) } const OrdersManagement = () => { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(null) const [servedQuantities, setServedQuantities] = useState({}) const [newOrderName, setNewOrderName] = useState("") const loadOrders = async () => { setLoading(true); // Bắt đầu tải try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/orders/serving', { method: 'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } const data = await response.json(); console.log('Orders:', data); setOrders(data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching orders:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); // Kết thúc tải } }; const served = async (orderId, dishId, quantity) => { try { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/orders/served', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ orderId, dishId, quantity }), }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to update served status'); } await loadOrders(); servedQuantities = ''; alert(`Dish ${dishId} in Order ${orderId} has been marked as served!`); } catch (error) { console.error('Error updating served status:', error); alert('Failed to mark dish as served. Please try again.'); } }; const handleQuantityChange = (orderId, dishId, value) => { setServedQuantities((prev) => ({ ...prev, [`${orderId}-${dishId}`]: value, })); }; useEffect(() => { loadOrders() }) const addOrder = () => { alert(`Adding order: ${newOrderName}`) setNewOrderName("") } return (
}> {error && (
{error}
)}
{loading ? (
Loading orders...
) : ( <> {orders.length === 0 ? (

No orders to serve at the moment.

) : (
{orders.map((order, index) => ( ))}
Table ID Dish Name Remaining Quantity to Serve Action
{order.TableID} {order.DishName} {order.RemainingQuantity} handleQuantityChange(order.OrderID, order.DishID, e.target.value)} placeholder="Qty" className="quantity-input" />
)} )} }>
setNewOrderName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter order name" className="form-input" />
) } const Content = ({ selectedPage }) => { switch (selectedPage) { case "dashboard": return case "user": return case "menu": return } /> case "order": return case "payment": return } /> case "settings": return } /> default: return } } export default Content
